text: I have not listened to the soundtrack for this game yet, but i will eventually.  I am also pondering about whether or not to get this game due to my bad habits with RPGs.  Also, i could get a little worried if i have to level grind a lot.
author: Eric C.

text: I played EO4 to completion and tried this one's demo... but I don't feel like getting it. I've listened to the remixes though; they're very good.
author: Sephiko

text:
I loved this rendition of the Withered Forest upon first hearing it. I like how it slows down the overall pace of the original, but is able to keep the same feeling the original version provides.
Also, that saxophone is wonderful in this version of the song. Yuzo Koshiro is a fantastic composer.
author: CaboosesApprentice

text: A great remake of the first Etrian Odyssey. The Withered Forest was my favorite track in the original, and it's still the case here. Gotta love Yuzo Koshiro! He has great range. Etrian Odyssey is a highly regarded niche series, it'd be quite interesting to have a big entry for the Wii U, it could work really well thanks to the gamepad.
author: SupraDarky

text: There are so many awesome 3DS games, it's pretty hard to say. I bought Bravely Default today and I'd definitely recommend that game. Super Mario 3D Land and Resident Evil Revelations are some of my favorites as well. Then there are games I haven't even played like Mario&Luigi: Dream Team, Luigi's Mansion 2, Shin Megami Tensei IV, Kid Icarus, Pokemon X/Y... the choice is yours. Happy birthday!
author: SupraDarky

text: @***** I'm on a quest to find Santa, I believe he has a way of stopping time that could help me finish my backlog of 100+ games.
